plotTitle: Descent into the Old Mines of Ember Hollow
mainObjective: Navigate the abandoned mines to find the hidden entrance to the Dwarven Complex and uncover the secrets of the Ember Enclave

plotPoints.title: Entering the Mines
plotPoints.description: The party arrives at the Entrance Tunnel (R1) and begins their exploration of the old mines. They encounter Old Miner Gregor, who warns them about recent strange activities.

sideQuests.title: Recover Lost Equipment
sideQuests.description: Old Miner Gregor asks the party to find his lost tools in the Equipment Storage (R6).

plotPoints.title: Exploring the Abandoned Office
plotPoints.description: In the Abandoned Mining Office (R2), the party finds old maps and notes hinting at hidden passages and the existence of a dwarven artifact.

plotPoints.title: Facing the Collapsed Passage
plotPoints.description: At the Collapsed Passage (R3), the party must navigate unstable terrain or find an alternative route. They discover signs of recent excavation.

plotPoints.title: Surviving the Gas Pocket Chamber
plotPoints.description: The Gas Pocket Chamber (R4) poses environmental hazards that the party must overcome. They find evidence of dwarven mining techniques.

plotPoints.title: Confronting the Fire Beetle Nest
plotPoints.description: The party encounters a nest of Fire Beetles in R5 and must deal with them to proceed. They discover that the beetles are drawn to a strange energy source.

plotPoints.title: Finding Useful Supplies
plotPoints.description: In the Equipment Storage (R6), the party finds useful gear and clues about the Ember Enclave's activities in the mine.

plotPoints.title: Discovering the Hidden Passage
plotPoints.description: The party uncovers a Hidden Passage (R7) leading closer to their goal. They find ancient dwarven runes that hint at the stronghold's defenses.

plotPoints.title: Crossing the Underground Stream
plotPoints.description: At the Underground Stream (R8), the party must find a way across or follow it to new areas. They notice the water has unusual magical properties.

plotPoints.title: Navigating the Ore Processing Room
plotPoints.description: In the Ore Processing Room (R9), the party discovers signs of recent activity and clues about the Ember Enclave's mining operations.

plotPoints.title: Encounter with Ember Enclave Guards
plotPoints.description: At the Guard Post (R10), the party confronts members of the Ember Enclave. They learn about the Enclave's search for an ancient dwarven artifact.

plotPoints.title: Exploring the Crystal Cavern
plotPoints.description: In the Crystal Cavern (R11), the party discovers valuable crystals and hidden messages left by the dwarves. They learn about the true nature of the artifact.

sideQuests.title: Collect Rare Crystals
sideQuests.description: An alchemist's note requests the retrieval of specific crystals from this cavern for a powerful potion.

plotPoints.title: Traversing the Abandoned Shaft
plotPoints.description: The Abandoned Shaft (R12) presents challenges in navigation and safety. The party finds evidence of a hasty evacuation by the dwarves.

plotPoints.title: Dealing with Waterlogged Tunnels
plotPoints.description: In the Waterlogged Tunnels (R13), the party must manage flooding and aquatic creatures. They discover a partial map to the dwarven stronghold.

plotPoints.title: Reaching the Hidden Entrance
plotPoints.description: The party reaches the Hidden Entrance to the Dwarven Complex (R14), completing their main objective in the mines. To gain entry, they must solve an ancient dwarven puzzle lock. The puzzle consists of a circular stone door with five concentric rings, each engraved with dwarven runes. The party must rotate these rings to align specific runes, creating a code based on clues found throughout their journey. Once the correct sequence is set, they will be confronted by a stone guradian and must speak the dwarven phrase 'Khazad-dÃ»m' to to deactivate the stone guardian and open the door.
plotPoints.plotImpact: The party has reached the Hidden Entrance to the Dwarven Complex and now faces the ancient dwarven puzzle door, signs of failed forced entry, and a mysterious dwarven guardian. Clues and dangers are present at every turn.

plotPoints.title: Revelation at the Ancient Shrine
plotPoints.description: In the Ancient Dwarven Shrine (R15), the party experiences visions of the stronghold's history and learns about the artifact's significance.

plotPoints.title: Secrets in the Forgotten Library
plotPoints.description: The Forgotten Library (R16) contains ancient texts that reveal the true purpose of the mines and the danger the artifact poses if misused.

plotPoints.title: Trial of the Enchanted Forge
plotPoints.description: At the Enchanted Forge (R17), the party faces a dwarven trial, testing their worthiness to enter the stronghold.

plotPoints.title: Discovery in the Subterranean Garden
plotPoints.description: The Subterranean Garden (R18) houses rare plants and a hidden dwarven laboratory, providing insight into dwarven alchemy and the artifact's creation.

plotPoints.title: Infiltrating the War Room
plotPoints.description: In the Ember Enclave War Room (R19), the party uncovers the full extent of the Enclave's plans and their misunderstanding of the artifact's power.

plotPoints.title: Unlocking the Time-Locked Vault
plotPoints.description: The party must solve a complex puzzle to unlock the Time-Locked Vault (R20), which contains a crucial component of the artifact needed to safely enter the stronghold.
